pages.title: Immediate Priorities
pages.text: Treat this world like a hostile expedition, not a long-term build. During your first nights, gather food, logs, coal, and iron while keeping routes simple and repeatable. The protocol thrives on routine; obvious habits become targeting data.

pages.title: Operational Setup
pages.text: Build a compact shelter with clear sight lines. Keep a spare bed, shield, and 2 food stacks in a dedicated emergency chest. Use signs to timestamp unusual events (sound, block movement, timing errors). Documentation prevents second-guessing later.
